flawed_nl_solution:
Mr. Salazar had 7 x 12 = <<7*12=84>>84 oranges.
He reserved 84 x 1/4 = <<84*1/4=21>>21 oranges for his friend.
Ha had 84 - 21 = <<84-21=36>>36 oranges to be sold yesterday.
But only 36 x 3/7 = <<36*3/7=108/7>>108/7 oranges were sold yesterday.
So, he had 36 - 108/7 = <<36-108/7=144/7>>144/7 oranges left.
Since four oranges are rotten, then only 144/7 - 4 = <<144/7-4=116/7>>116/7 oranges are left to be sold today.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 63, not 36. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
